li.hideDescription: Furry pelt of a genetically modified human. It's soft and fuzzy and perfect for making warm winter sweaters, although most people would be troubled by its source. Needs tanning.

Biogenetically engineered skin with extraordinary resistance to heat and flames. The only caveat is that it was grown on a living human person who is no longer in possesion of it, although that would be of little concern to some. Needs tanning.
